staff.title: Raymond Mathis - Senior Wall Street Analyst
staff.description: Senior Wall Street Analyst and Financial Mentor at Viswise Academy, innovator in financial education with 15+ years of experience.

seo.metaTitle: Raymond Mathis - Senior Wall Street Analyst | SCISS Guest Speaker
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Raymond Mathis, Senior Wall Street Analyst and Financial Mentor at Viswise Academy, innovator in financial education.

staff.bio: Raymond Mathis brings over 15 years of experience as a senior equity research analyst at S&P Global and portfolio manager at David Lerner Associates. He currently serves as a financial mentor at Viswise Academy, training future decision-makers to Wall Street standards. He specializes in REITs, financial sectors, fixed income, equities, and alternative assets, and is an innovator in financial education.

experience.description: Leading equity research and market analysis
Managing investment portfolios and strategies

achievements: Senior equity research analyst at S&P Global
Portfolio manager at David Lerner Associates
Financial mentor at Viswise Academy
Expert in REITs, financial sectors, fixed income, equities, and alternative assets

staff.title: Angelene Huang - President & Chair of Springfield Commonwealth Academy
staff.description: President & Chair of Springfield Commonwealth Academy (SCA), cross-sector leader in finance, education, tech & social impact.

seo.metaTitle: Angelene Huang - President & Chair of Springfield Commonwealth Academy | SCISS Guest Speaker
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Angelene Huang, President & Chair of Springfield Commonwealth Academy (SCA), cross-sector leader in finance, education, tech & social impact.

staff.bio: Angelene Huang serves as President and Chair of Springfield Commonwealth Academy (SCA). With nearly a decade in high-frequency trading and global capital markets, she brings cross-sector leadership in finance, education, technology, and social impact. She previously served as President of New York Military Academy (NYMA), where she reversed financial deficits and restored school reputation. Her leadership style combines warmth within rationality, and her mission is to cultivate responsible global citizens.

experience.description: Leading campus transformation, academic reform, and enrollment revival
Reversed financial deficits and restored school reputation

achievements: Reversed financial deficits and restored school reputation at NYMA
Leading campus transformation, academic reform, and enrollment revival at SCA
Nearly a decade in high-frequency trading and global capital markets
Focus areas: AI, sustainability, entrepreneurship

staff.title: Satya S. Tripathi - Former UN Assistant Secretary-General
staff.description: Former UN Assistant Secretary-General and Secretary-General of the Global Alliance for a Sustainable Planet, pioneer in natural resource governance and sustainability.

seo.metaTitle: Satya S. Tripathi - Former UN Assistant Secretary-General | SCISS Guest Speaker
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Satya S. Tripathi, former UN Assistant Secretary-General and Secretary-General of the Global Alliance for a Sustainable Planet.

staff.bio: Satya S. Tripathi serves as Secretary-General of the Global Alliance for a Sustainable Planet. With over 35 years of experience, he was Assistant Secretary-General and Head of the New York Office at the United Nations Environment Programme (UNEP). He pioneered planet-centered development focusing on green technology, carbon finance, and impact investment. His philosophy centers on planet-centered development, with focus areas including green technology, carbon finance, and impact investment.

experience.company: Global Alliance for a Sustainable Planet
experience.description: Leading global sustainability initiatives and environmental governance
Head of the New York Office and environmental policy leadership

achievements: Led Indonesia's REDD+ program
Led India's Sustainable Finance Facility
Led $7 billion post-disaster reconstruction in Aceh-Nias
Advised Liberia on resource policy
Participated in Cyprus peace negotiations

With over 30 years of experience across hospitality, retail, finance, and international business, she brings cross-industry expertise to global talent development.

Led quality and training initiatives across Asia-Pacific
Directed international trade initiatives for New Jersey

achievements: Founded StoneBridge USA Consulting
Director of Quality and Training for Wyndham Hotels Asia-Pacific
International Trade Director for the State of New Jersey
Advocates for youth and women's career development, education equity, and global mobility

staff.title: Robyn Lee Miller - MorningBird Media Founder
staff.description: Founder of MorningBird Media, full-service woman-owned marketing and advertising agency, specializing in AI tools for marketing and empowering small businesses.

seo.metaTitle: Robyn Lee Miller - MorningBird Media Founder | SCISS Guest Speaker
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Robyn Lee Miller, founder of MorningBird Media, specializing in AI tools for marketing and empowering small businesses.

staff.bio: Robyn Lee Miller founded MorningBird Media in 2018, a full-service, woman-owned marketing and advertising agency based in Springfield, MA. With over 20 years of experience in radio and corporate communications, she specializes in AI tools for marketing and empowering small businesses. She is an adjunct professor at Western New England University and has founded the MorningBird Moms support network for over 1,500 mom-entrepreneurs.

experience.description: Leading full-service marketing and advertising agency

achievements: Founded MorningBird Moms support network for over 1,500 mom-entrepreneurs
Adjunct professor at Western New England University
Active in The Advertising Club of Western Massachusetts

staff.title: Prof. Jianwei Zhang - Global Leader in Cross-Modal AI and Robotics
staff.description: Academician of German National Academy of Engineering and Hamburg Academy of Sciences, Director of TAMS Lab at University of Hamburg.

seo.metaTitle: Prof. Jianwei Zhang - Global Leader in Cross-Modal AI and Robotics | SCISS Guest Speaker
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Prof. Jianwei Zhang, Academician of German National Academy of Engineering and Director of TAMS Lab at University of Hamburg.

staff.bio: Prof. Jianwei Zhang is an Academician of the German National Academy of Engineering and Hamburg Academy of Sciences. As tenured professor and Director of the TAMS Lab at University of Hamburg, he leads research in sensor fusion, semantic perception, reinforcement learning, and cognitive control. He has published 500+ academic papers and holds 40+ patents, with multiple IEEE Best Paper Awards to his credit.

experience.description: Leading TAMS Lab research in cross-modal AI and robotics

achievements: Published 500+ academic papers
Holds 40+ patents
Multiple IEEE Best Paper Awards
Led Germany-China SFB/TRR169 Collaborative Research Center

staff.title: Lawrence Pan - Former Chief Representative of NASDAQ China
staff.description: Former Chief Representative of NASDAQ China & Asia-Pacific Director, U.S.-China capital market specialist with 30+ years of experience.

seo.metaTitle: Lawrence Pan - Former Chief Representative of NASDAQ China | SCISS Guest Speaker
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Lawrence Pan, former Chief Representative of NASDAQ China and Asia-Pacific Director, U.S.-China capital market specialist.

staff.position: Former Chief Representative of NASDAQ China
staff.bio: Lawrence Pan brings over 30 years of experience in cross-border IPO and capital market operations. As former Chief Representative of NASDAQ China and Asia-Pacific Director, he has helped over 30 Chinese companies successfully list on NASDAQ, facilitating billions in capital. He specializes in U.S. securities law, IPO procedures, M&A, and financial compliance.

experience.description: Leading NASDAQ operations in China and Asia-Pacific

achievements: Helped over 30 Chinese companies successfully list on NASDAQ
Facilitated billions in capital
Expert in U.S. securities law and IPO procedures

staff.title: Leena Palav - Global Business Growth Consultant
staff.description: Global Business Growth Consultant, Senior Mentor at Founders Institute, and President of Grandview Group specializing in med-tech and clean energy startups.

seo.metaTitle: Leena Palav - Global Business Growth Consultant | SCISS Guest Speaker
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Leena Palav, Global Business Growth Consultant and Senior Mentor at Founders Institute, specializing in med-tech and clean energy startups.

staff.bio: Leena Palav is President of Grandview Group and Senior Mentor at Founders Institute. With over 20 years of experience across healthcare, energy, technology, and consumer goods, she specializes in med-tech, clean energy, digital health, and consumer innovation startups. She previously served as COO of VisionSpring, where she led the company to over 30% growth during the pandemic and delivered 2 million PPE items and 1,000 ventilators worldwide.

experience.description: Leading global business growth consulting
Led company to over 30% growth during pandemic

achievements: Led VisionSpring to over 30% growth during pandemic
Delivered 2 million PPE items and 1,000 ventilators worldwide
Senior Mentor at Founders Institute

staff.title: Deano Pape - Director of Membership, National Speech & Debate Association
staff.description: Director of Membership at National Speech & Debate Association (NSDA) with 25+ years of experience in public speaking and debate education.

seo.metaTitle: Deano Pape - Director of Membership, NSDA | SCISS Guest Speaker
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Deano Pape, Director of Membership at National Speech & Debate Association, expert in public speaking and debate education.

staff.bio: Deano Pape serves as Director of Membership at the National Speech & Debate Association (NSDA), overseeing coach support, member engagement, and program outreach for thousands of schools nationwide. With 25+ years of experience, he focuses on educational equity and speech access. He previously served as Assistant Director of Speech & Debate and Co-Director of Ethics Bowl at Simpson College, and has taught at the Harvard Debate Council Summer Workshop.

experience.description: Leading membership and program outreach for thousands of schools

achievements: Former Assistant Director of Speech & Debate at Simpson College
Co-Director of Ethics Bowl at Simpson College
Teaching at Harvard Debate Council Summer Workshop

staff.title: Hope Ross Gibaldi - Director of Entrepreneurship & Innovation, Williams College
staff.description: Director of Entrepreneurship & Innovation at Williams College's '68 Center for Career Exploration and founder of Valley Venture Mentors (VVM).

seo.metaTitle: Hope Ross Gibaldi - Director of Entrepreneurship & Innovation, Williams College | SCISS Guest Speaker
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Hope Ross Gibaldi, Director of Entrepreneurship & Innovation at Williams College and founder of Valley Venture Mentors.

staff.bio: Hope Ross Gibaldi serves as Director of Entrepreneurship & Innovation at Williams College's '68 Center for Career Exploration. She founded Valley Venture Mentors (VVM), the region's largest entrepreneurship hub, and has co-founded multiple ventures including LEARN IN MOTION. She holds an MBA from UMass Amherst's Isenberg School and a BA in Spanish & Anthropology from Drew University.

experience.description: Leading entrepreneurship and innovation programs at Williams College
Founded region's largest entrepreneurship hub

achievements: Founded Valley Venture Mentors (VVM)
Co-founded LEARN IN MOTION
Launched Entrepreneurial Spirit business coaching practice
Active in SPARK and EforAll mentoring programs

staff.title: Alex Song - General Manager of Mascon
staff.description: General Manager of Mascon, global supply chain and industrial strategy leader with expertise in precision manufacturing and medical devices.

seo.metaTitle: Alex Song - General Manager of Mascon | SCISS Guest Speaker
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Alex Song, General Manager of Mascon, global supply chain and industrial strategy leader.

staff.bio: Alex Song serves as General Manager of Mascon, a U.S.-based company with nearly 50 years of history. He leads precision manufacturing, medical devices, defense, and emergency supply operations, with expertise in building global supply chains and industrial strategy. He previously served as VP of Engineering at Mascon and has led the company's global response to COVID-19, building emergency supply chains from China to U.S.

experience.description: Leading global manufacturing and supply chain operations
Leading engineering and technical operations

achievements: Led Mascon's global response to COVID-19
Built emergency supply chains from China to U.S.
Delivered millions of masks, PPE, and ventilators meeting FDA, NIOSH, and ITAR compliance

staff.title: Mary Cao - International Film Producer
staff.description: Canada-based international film producer and founder of Sino-Euro Women's Film Festival with 20+ years of experience in film production.

seo.metaTitle: Mary Cao - International Film Producer | SCISS Guest Speaker
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Mary Cao, Canada-based international film producer and founder of Sino-Euro Women's Film Festival.

staff.bio: Mary Cao is a Canada-based international film producer with over 20 years of experience. She is the sole Asian partner of Italian legendary producer Mario Cotone and founder of the Sino-Euro Women's Film Festival. Her work spans feature films, documentaries, and cultural exchange initiatives. She has produced notable films including The Last Emperor, Life is Beautiful, Malèna, and Two Tigers, and received the International Expert Prize at Waseda University Metaverse Conference in Japan (2024).

experience.description: Leading international film production and cultural exchange

achievements: Founded Sino-Euro Women's Film Festival
Produced notable films including The Last Emperor, Life is Beautiful
International Expert Prize at Waseda University Metaverse Conference (2024)
Board positions at China International PR Association and Macau Film Association

staff.title: Sunny Zhang - Co-Founder & President of Longteng Cultural Foundation
staff.description: Co-Founder & President of Longteng Cultural Foundation and Chief Planner of Global Chinese IP Film Festival.

seo.metaTitle: Sunny Zhang - Co-Founder & President of Longteng Cultural Foundation | SCISS Guest Speaker
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Sunny Zhang, Co-Founder & President of Longteng Cultural Foundation and Chief Planner of Global Chinese IP Film Festival.

staff.bio: Sunny Zhang is Co-Founder & President of Longteng Cultural Development Foundation and Chief Planner of the International Chinese Original IP Film Festival. With background as senior film reporter at Wenhui Daily, author, screenwriter, and digital strategist, she bridges creative expression with cultural leadership. She is a pioneer of internet marketing in China, co-authored the bestseller Super Girl, Super Planning, and was named one of China's Top 10 Women in IT.

experience.description: Leading cultural foundation and film festival initiatives

achievements: Pioneer of internet marketing in China
Co-authored bestseller Super Girl, Super Planning
Named one of China's Top 10 Women in IT
Founder and editor of Dushiniang media platform

staff.title: Stephanie Sun - COO of The Welcoming Center
staff.description: COO of The Welcoming Center and First Asian American Vice President of Pennsylvania's Largest Civil Rights Organization.

seo.metaTitle: Stephanie Sun - COO of The Welcoming Center | SCISS Guest Speaker
seo.metaDescription: Learn from Stephanie Sun, COO of The Welcoming Center and First Asian American Vice President of Pennsylvania's Largest Civil Rights Organization.

staff.bio: Stephanie Sun serves as Chief Operating Officer (COO) of The Welcoming Center and Vice President of the League of Women Voters of Pennsylvania. She is the first Asian American and first immigrant COO of The Welcoming Center, and the first Asian American elected Vice President of League of Women Voters of Pennsylvania. She has executive roles in three Fortune Global 100 companies across three countries and was a key figure behind the inclusion of Chinese as the first Asian language in Pennsylvania's election system.

experience.description: Leading immigration services and community development

experience.company: League of Women Voters of Pennsylvania
experience.description: First Asian American elected to this position

achievements: Key figure behind inclusion of Chinese as first Asian language in Pennsylvania's election system
Helped usher in trilingual ballot system in 2022
Co-organized first government hearing on Asian American issues in Pennsylvania's history
Executive roles in three Fortune Global 100 companies across three countries
